Musical - Django Application

Table of contents

views.py

musical.views.about(request)[source]

This function will be used to Render about.html webpage. If: User is signed in pass current user to rendered webpage Else: Just render

param any request:

HTTP-REQUEST

returns:

Render HTML Webpage

rtype:

HTTP-RESPONSE

musical.views.home(request)[source]

This function will be used to Render home.html webpage. If: User is signed in pass current user to rendered webpage Else: Just render

param any request:

HTTP-REQUEST

returns:

Render HTML Webpage

rtype:

HTTP-RESPONSE

This function will be used to Render intro.html webpage. If: User is signed in pass current user to rendered webpage Else: Just render
